item.title: Manjaro; Clevo Laptop; No Sound
item.description: Symptoms No sound in Linux. Reporting of pavucontrol shows that sound is being emitted to the device but nothing happens. Messages in dmesg [ 37.482138] snd_hda_codec_realtek hdaudioC0D0: Unable to sync register 0x1f0e00. -5 [ 37.482235] snd_hda_codec_realtek hdaudioC0D0: Unable to sync register 0x1f0e00. -5 Configuration Laptop Clevo with P95_96_97Ex,Rx. Dual-boot Manjaro 20 with Windows 10. uname -v -r -o 5.7.0-1-MANJARO #1 SMP PREEMPT Tue Apr 21 20:48:43 UTC 2020 GNU/Linux 5.7.0-1-MANJARO
